info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:07PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN KERN AND SOUTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM PDT... At 606 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Bodfish, or 27 miles southeast of Porterville, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Glennville, Fountain Springs, and Uhl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
